summary: A comedian replies to the "Super Size Me" crowd by losing weight on a fast-food diet while demonstrating that almost everything you think you know about the obesity "epidemic" and healthy eating is wrong.
cast: Peter Paddon|Tom Naughton|Chareva Naughton|Sally Fallon Morell|Mary Enig|Michael R. Eades|Mary Dan Eades|Al Sears|Eric Oliver|Jacob Sullum|Eric Feit|Michael Jacobson|George McGovern|Shirley Naughton|Robert Olson|Margo Wootan
title: Fat Head
